bond.name: New Year Game > Titania [New Year]
bond.value: Increases Titania [New Year]'s crit rate by 5%

skill.name: Infinite Playfulness
skill.value: Restores 1872/2232 HP to all allies. Targets receive 30/36% less DMG for a limited time.

ability.name: Seasonal Fun (Lv. 70)
ability.value: Moderately increases the skill DMG of the 2 allies with the highest ATK at the start of the final wave.
